import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import defaultAvatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" const RideCard = ({ ride }) => { const getAmenityIcon = (amenity) => { const icons = { wifi: "fas fa-wifi", music: "fas fa-music", "non-smoking": "fas fa-ban", "air-conditioning": "fas fa-snowflake", "pets-allowed": "fas fa-paw", } return icons[amenity] || "fas fa-check" } return (
{ride.driver.name}
{"★".repeat(Math.floor(ride.driver.rating))} {ride.driver.rating}
{ride.from}
{ride.to}
{ride.time}
{ride.date}
{ride.price} TND
par personne
{ride.availableSeats} /{ride.totalSeats} places libres
{ride.car}
Voir
{ride.amenities && ride.amenities.length > 0 && (
{ride.amenities.map((amenity, index) => ( {amenity.replace("-", " ")} ))}
)}
) } export default RideCard
